text: Mee ga hanimoi e hai dana gabunga, gadoo be tangada dudu baalanga, e haga madammaa ana silber. Tangada kae hegau a Dimaadua ga haga madammaa digau hai mee dabu, gadoo be tangada ngalua baalanga dela e haga madammaa ana silber mono goolo, gei digau hai mee dabu aalaa ga gaamai gi Dimaadua nia hagadilinga tigidaumaha ala e donu.
